item.title: Hello World
item.description: This blog (and new site) meets the Internet.

item.title: About
item.description: Well, who am I # I’m a 15 year old Norwegian computer nerd who enjoys tinkering with code and software. I also like playing games. I sound really generic, don’t I? Maybe cause I am. Here’s a summary of my personality, in audio format: Seems like playing audio isn't supported in your browser. What I’ve done and made # I’ve: been in 3 organizations dabbling with computers. (Terrific Tea Studios, Neutron Technologies, Project Segfault) made a tool called Fixdows (now private) lived for 14 years (amazing accomplishment) Probably some more things I forgot.

item.title: My email
item.description: Well, like most people, I have an email address. # My e-mail address is odyssey346@disroot.org. I have other e-mail addresses than this one, but this is the one I’d like you to use. If you need my public key, here it is.
